title: How do I get 1000 AP without being veigar?
body:
Do you guys know if there is a build wich can give you 1000 AP without baron?
I mean if the build with baron alrady has like 930 AP I don't mind but is there like a build that
guaranteed gives you 900 AP+ ( with runes and masteries ofc ) and if they're any runes
that help please tell me, I don't know if I should buy scalling AP or regular AP.

Thank you.

replies.body:
Ayy, I gotta try this in a custom or something sometime :)

I always thought after the ap nerfs to the ap items a while back it wasn't attainable. 

Can you explain the seraphs embrace ap thing?
seraphs gives mana based on max mana, rod of ages and morellonomicon gives mana and 100 ap each, making the mana pool go higher, increasing your ap

Seraph's Embrace + Rabadon's Deathcap + 25 Stacks Mejai's Soulstealer + (either any other high AP items or 3 more RDCs xD) + Elixir of Sorcery + 3 x Infernal Drake + Elder Dragon + Baron. 

You don't need *all* of this since this will easily overshoot the 1,000 AP mark, but doing this will guarantee you getting at least 1,000 AP. 

I hope this helps :)

>Seraph's Embrace + Rabadon's Deathcap + 25 Stacks Mejai's Soulstealer 

Full stacks ROA and Merellonomnomnomnomnomicon will probably do it because of the mana.
RoA and Morellonomican as well as those 3?
Reasonably sure those give give the most ap of any 5 items (haven't done any calculations though)
Morello and RoA both only give 100 AP. However, they both come with *a lot* of mana, which will stack the Seraph's Embrace.

also you can still stack RoAs for the mana which means each one is worth around 100 ap + 3% of 400mana, so 112 ap each before rabadons enhancement. Morellos end up being worth the same with the same max mana and ap. Seraph lacks raw ap, and ends up being worth 110 ap.

In terms of pure ap, when you come to stack a full build. Rabadons just wins with raw 120ap.
